item.title: Mythical Man Month [Book]
item.description: The Mythical Man-Month: Essays on Software Engineering. Brooks, Jr., Frederick P. Oct 1, 1974. ISBN: 0201006502. Summaries of chapters that I’ve read from Frederick Brooks’s “Mythical Man Month”.
